unable_to_create_action_notification.message: Unable to create the action. The input provided is not valid.

unable_to_update_action_notification.message: Unable to update the action. The input provided is not valid.

the_last_action_cannot_be_deleted_notifi.message: The last action cannot be deleted.

window_hostname_comparison_label_text.message: Use the hostname in the active tab of each window as a basis for comparison

open_new_tab_after_action_label_text.message: Open a new tab after the action

urls_after_action_label_text.message: URLs to be opened after the action

actions_section_help_text.message:
Here, you can define what actions appear in the context menus. Each action closes, pins or unpins tabs. The extension's icon context menu can have up to 6 actions. The "on page" context menu can have a lot more.

To create a new action first, select any action from the "Actions" dropdown. The settings of the chosen action will populate the inputs under the Create/Update/Delete action buttons. Edit these settings, then press the "Create action" button. The new action will appear in the "Actions" dropdown.

To update a current action, first, select it from the "Actions" dropdown. The settings of the chosen action will populate the inputs under the Create/Update/Delete action buttons. Edit these settings, then press the "Update action" button.

To delete an action, select it from the "Actions" dropdown and press the "Delete action" button.

actions_help_text.message: All actions in the order they appear in the context menus. Each action closes, pins or unpins tabs.

main_action_help_text.message: What action to perform when you press the extension's icon. Action closes, pins or unpins tabs.

action_btns_help_text.message:
To create a new action first, select any action from the "Actions" dropdown. The settings of the chosen action will populate the inputs under the Create/Update/Delete action buttons. Edit these settings, then press the "Create action" button. The new action will appear in the "Actions" dropdown.

To update a current action first, select it from the "Actions" dropdown. The settings of the chosen action will populate the inputs under the Create/Update/Delete action buttons. Edit these settings, then press the "Update action" button.

To delete an action, select it from the "Actions" dropdown and press the "Delete action" button.

action_name_help_text.message: A name of an action, as it appears in the context menus.

action_position_help_text.message: Defines the order of an action in the context menus.

window_hostname_comparison_help_text.message:
If unchecked, the hostname in the active tab of the CURRENT window will be used as a basis for comparison instead.

Example:
You have two windows. Each has four tabs, two facebook.com tabs and two reddit.com tabs. In the first window, facebook.com is the active tab. In the second, it's reddit.com. You're running close action with the "All windows", "Other tabs" and "Current hostname" settings.

If unchecked, the non-current facebook.com tabs will be closed in both windows.

If checked, the non-current facebook.com tab will be closed in the first window, but in the second window, it'll be the reddit.com tab.

url_whitelist_help_text.message:
Defines on which URLs or parts of URLs to perform an action.

Cancels out the effect of "Affect tabs by hostname: Current hostname".

Cancels out the effect of "URL blacklist".

url_blacklist_help_text.message:
Defines on which URLs or parts of URLs to NOT perform an action.

Cancels out the effect of all "Affect tabs by hostname" options.

The effect is canceled out by "URL whitelist".

tab_counter_is_visible_help_text.message: Show the number of currently opened tabs on the extension's icon.
